fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 dropped 234.15 points or 1.17% to settle at 19,745. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, declined 2.54% to 11.49. Infosys, HDFC Bank, and Reliance Industries (RIL) were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The July 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 27 July 2023.
